column3: and various media outlets definitely blew smoke for Smoque. The inside leaves something to be desired
column4: I get it it's a hole in the wall
column5: but after many years of success you would think you would fix the chipping paint on the wall of awards. The seating is very tight and awkward
column6: there's a host to sit you
column7: but it seems like they love to sit people in awkward places. I felt like many of the employees were encroaching on people's personal spaces and the service leaves something to be desired-it's very much "what do you want
column10: next" and you're just a number here. We came here today during lunch time and it wasn't very packed.
